channel.title: Talks on frieda rong
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on frieda rong

item.title: BEHAVIOR feedback: a benchmark for social perception
item.description: A project pitch for how smart agents can interact with us to better understand our goals in household activities by learning individual and cultural diversity.

item.title: Differentiable Rendering: Overview
item.description: A survey talk based on section 2 from this survey paper on Differentiable Rendering.

item.title: [Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models](https://hojonathanho.github.io/diffusion) paper review
item.description: As graciously explained to me by one of the authors, Ajay Jain. (Any errors are mine!)

item.title: Intro to Statistics for Data Science / Machine Learning
item.description: The second of two talks on linear algebra and statistics in machine learning, joint with Anzo Teh.

item.title: Variational Autoencoders
item.description: In addition to research and internship opportunities, I learned about AI through reading and summarizing blog posts and papers, then giving talks like this one.
